title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 3.21 - Storage of cleaned containers and equipment-item 13p
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 3.21 - Storage of cleaned containers and equipment-item 13p

State Regulations
(a) All multiuse containers, equipment and
utensils, after cleaning, shall be drained dry and protected from
contamination. (b) All cans and
other multiuse containers and equipment shall be transported and stored in
clean crates or on racks in a clean place and shall be protected from splash, flies and dust. (For protection against overhead leakage and condensation, see
section
3.23
of this Part [Item 15p].) Such
containers as can practicably be inverted shall be stored in an inverted
position. Storage racks shall be constructed of metal which is protected
against rusting. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
3.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
